ModMetaData.name: [KIR]Drop Pod Raids are Spacer Tech
ModMetaData.author: Kirby23590
ModMetaData.description:
Simply Changes the Drop Pod Arrival Mode from Industrial Tech to Spacer Tech Level.

What that means is that it removes the use of drops from outlanders since their tech level is industrial or from other mod factions that uses industrial tech.

However Pirate, Mechanoids & Spacer or higher tech factions will still use them to raid you with drop pods.

Outlanders & other industrial tech factions will still use drop pods for resupplying in sieges & still do sieges.
This Mod doesn't simply remove drop pod raids, only from industrial tech factions only.
